# Pratt+ (2009) https://arxiv.org/pdf/0809.3784.pdf (Tables 1 and B1)
# Columns:
# (1) Cluster name;
# (2) z: cluster redshift;
# (3) T1: spectroscopic temperature of the R < R500 region in keV;
# (4) L [0.1 − 2.4]1: [0.1 − 2.4] keV band luminosity in the R < R500 region;
# (5) L [0.5 − 2]1: [0.5 − 2] keV band luminosity in the R < R500 region;
# (6) T2: spectroscopic temperature in the [0.15 − 1] R500 region in keV;
# (7) L [0.1 − 2.4]2 : [0.1 − 2.4] keV band luminosity in the [0.15 − 1] R500 region;
# (8) L [0.5 − 2]2: [0.5 − 2] keV band luminosity in the [0.15 − 1] R500 region.
# (9) YX in units of 10^13 Msun keV
# (10) R500 in kpc
# (11) cool cores based on central density vs. tcool (Sect. 2.3); 1=yes, 0=no
# (12) disturbed on the basis of the centre shift parameter <w> (Sect. 2.3); 1=yes, 0=no
# note: all luminosities, (4,5,7,8) in units of 10^44 erg s^-1
